description.narrative: Output 5: Environmental healthThe national Government and selected subnational governments and the private sector have strengthened capacities to deliver and promote climate-resilient and gender-responsive sanitation and, which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Health And Development In Early Childhood And Adolescence, Safe And Equitable Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Services And Practices, Strengthening Primary Health Care And High-Impact Health Interventions, Water, Sanitation And Hygiene Systems And Empowerment Of Communities. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Partnerships And Engagement: Public And Private, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, more children, particularly newborns, adolescents and other vulnerable children, including those with disabilities, survive, thrive, and are better able to achieve their

title.narrative: Output 5: Environmental healthThe national Government and selected subnational governments and the private sector havestrengthened capacities to deliver and promote climate-resilient and gender-responsive sanitation and

description.narrative: UNICEF has established a new programme on Environment and Health including a new partnership with the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and a workplan focused on results related to environment, climate change and youth engagement.In addition, the partnerships with the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Affairs as well as some provincial governments have been strengthened as reflected in various joint projects, including a sanitation project in Qinghai province to build gender-sensitive, inclusive and climate resilient sanitation facilities.;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:18/01/2022
